| History                 = The Patrillo Family used to be one of the most influential organizations in [[Cosa Nostra (Earth-616)|La Cosa Nostra]]. Ever since [[Bullseye (Lester) (Earth-616)|Bullseye]] decimated the family at a bachelor party, they've been losing ground to the [[Rossi Crime Family (Earth-616)|Rossi Family]]. They erroneously believed that it was the [[Frank Castle (Earth-616)|Punisher]] that nearly wiped them out. Twenty years later, Bullseye eliminated the last of the Patrillos and received payment from the Rossi.{{r|Punisher vs. Bullseye Vol 1 1}}
